introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Lumara prioritizes the protection of your data. This Privacy Policy informs you about how we collect, use, transmit, and protect your data when you visit our website or use our services.
introduction.consent: Please read this privacy policy carefully. By using our website and services, you consent to the practices described in this policy.

informationCollection.title: 2. Information Collection
informationCollection.subtitle: 2.1 Personal Data
informationCollection.content: We may collect personal data that you voluntarily provide to us when:
list: You fill out our contact form
You communicate with us via email or phone
informationCollection.additionalInfo: This data includes your name, email address, phone number, address, and any other information you provide.

informationUsage.title: 3. Information Usage
informationUsage.content: We use the collected information for the following purposes:
list: Communicating with you about our services

informationSharing.title: 4. Information Sharing
informationSharing.content: We do not sell or rent your personal data to third parties. We may share data in the following cases:
list: With our trusted partners who act on our behalf
With authorities when required by law
With another party with your consent

dataSecurity.title: 5. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal data. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

contact.title: 7. Contact
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

questions.question: Is a long-term contract necessary?
questions.answer: Not at all. Our services are tailored to your needs and designed to seamlessly fit into your busy schedule. However, you have the option to choose a long-term contract if you prefer.

questions.question: What is the minimum number of hours for cleaning tasks?
Do you provide cleaning supplies?
questions.answer: It depends on your needs. We recommend using your own supplies for safety and convenience. If you have specific preferences or requirements, we're happy to accommodate them to ensure your satisfaction. If needed, we can use our own cleaning supplies, which will be added to the cleaning price at 2000 Ft per session.

questions.question: What does regular cleaning include?
questions.answer:
Kitchen:
- Countertops and surfaces cleaning
- Sink and faucet cleaning and sanitization
- Cabinet front cleaning
- Tables and chairs cleaning
- Stovetop and hood exterior cleaning
- Visible cobweb removal
- Vacuuming and mopping

Bathroom:
- Toilet cleaning and sanitization
- Sink and faucet cleaning and sanitization
- Mirrors and other glass surfaces wiping
- Shower or bathtub cleaning and sanitization
- Soap residue and limescale removal from shower door
- Bathroom floor cleaning and sanitization, including behind toilet and around fixtures
- Additional surfaces cleaning and sanitization, such as shelves or cabinets
- Visible cobweb removal

Living Room:
- All surfaces dusting and wiping, including furniture, shelves, and electronics
- Vacuuming
- Glass surfaces cleaning and polishing, such as mirrors and coffee tables
- Visible cobweb removal

Bedrooms:
- All surfaces wiping, including furniture, nightstands, and lamps
- Vacuuming
- Mirrors or glass surfaces cleaning
- Visible cobweb removal

Hallway:
- Surface wiping
- Vacuuming, including rugs or runners
- Mirrors or glass surfaces cleaning
- Visible cobweb removal

questions.question: What to expect at the first meeting?
questions.answer: We arrive at your home or office at the agreed time, fully equipped with all necessary cleaning supplies for a comprehensive cleaning session. (We can also use your supplies.) The first meeting usually takes the most time as we need to learn the new environment and thoroughly begin the cleaning process.

questions.question: Is there anything to prepare before our arrival?
questions.answer: The optimal preparation consists of tidying up and organizing. This is necessary so that our colleague only needs to focus on cleaning, making the work more efficient and faster. Please remove toys or other items from the floor in advance, and it's necessary to remove any items that are on surfaces that need to be cleaned.

questions.question: Can I expect the same cleaning person every visit?
questions.answer: Absolutely. You can expect the same cleaning person or team to be assigned for every visit. We understand the importance of having a familiar and trustworthy person or team perform the cleaning. Whether it's a single worker or a pair of cleaners, it will be the same team every time. In case of illness or unexpected emergency, we will contact you immediately to make necessary arrangements.

questions.question: Do I need to be present during the cleaning process?
questions.answer: Some clients choose to schedule cleaning times while they're at work or otherwise occupied, while others prefer to be home during the cleaning session. The choice is entirely yours. We ensure that regardless of your preference, we are committed to providing first-class cleaning service that meets your expectations.

questions.question: How much does the cleaning service cost?
questions.answer: The price always depends on the building size, rug size, pets, and whether additional items need cleaning. Our hourly rate is 3500 Ft. For monthly or one-time cleaning, we charge a 25% surcharge per hour. Through our campaign, you can get a 30% discount on your first cleaning fee.

questions.question: Is it possible to cancel a pre-booked cleaning appointment?
questions.answer: Yes, 24 hours before the previously agreed time. If the appointment is cancelled within 24 hours, the full service fee must be paid. If the appointment is not cancelled and our colleague cannot access the property, 100% of the service fee must be paid.

questions.question: How do you access my home at the agreed cleaning times?
questions.answer:
You can give us a key.
You can choose to leave the key in a designated place.
You have the option to share your alarm code with us.
You can leave the door open on the planned cleaning day.

questions.question: What happens if I'm not satisfied with the cleaning?
questions.answer: Ensuring your satisfaction is our top priority. Therefore, we offer a satisfaction guarantee. If you have complaints, simply contact us within 24 hours after cleaning. We will organize a follow-up visit as soon as possible to address any areas that didn't meet your expectations. We fix any issues that arise free of charge.

questions.question: When and how can I pay for the cleaning service?
questions.answer: We send the invoice by email after the service is completed. You can pay by bank transfer. If this doesn't suit you, please let us know in advance.
